definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

pinyin: zheng4 dian4 zi3 fa1 she4 duan4 ceng2 zhao4 xiang1 shu4
containing_words.word: 正電子發射斷層照相術

sentences.english: The best of America's skaters beamed for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 最佳美國的溜冰者爲照相機放光了。

sentences.english: The terminal is used in conjunction with a photographic typesetter.
sentences.chinese: 這種終端與照相排版機一起使用。

sentences.english: How much are the three Kodaks?
sentences.chinese: 這三架柯達照相機要多少錢？

sentences.english: He angled the camera in the correct postion.
sentences.chinese: 他把照相機調到了適當的角度。

sentences.english: Once he took us to be photographed with him in some big English photographic studio.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，他帶我們到一個很大的英國照相館裏去照相。

sentences.english: Once he took us to be photographed with him in some big English photographic studio.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，他帶我們到一個很大的英國照相館裏去照相。

sentences.english: Sam could not supply (to purchase) the camera he longed for for it was too expensive.
sentences.chinese: 薩姆買不起他極想要那種照相機，因爲那相機太貴了。

sentences.english: The trends of development of photographic catalogs are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了照相星表工作的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: This article introduces the preparation method of photographic-grade EDTA ferriammonium activated iron solution.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了照相級乙二胺四乙酸鐵銨溶液的製備方法。

sentences.english: All in-camera meters are reflected-light meters. Reflected-light meters are calibrated to show the appropriate exposure for "average" scenes.
sentences.chinese: 所有融合在照相機內的測光表都是反射式的。

sentences.english: X-ray photography used to fathom such mysteries as honeybee navigation.
sentences.chinese: 用來探測像蜜蜂飛行導向這類奧祕的x光照相術。

sentences.english: Holographic photographic technique is a basic experiment in university physics experiment.
sentences.chinese: 全息照相技術是大學物理實驗中的一個基礎實驗。

sentences.english: It has just come to our notice that the Japanese camera canon manufactured by seiki- kogaku, tokyo, is very popular.
sentences.chinese: 久聞東京精機光學廠生產的“佳能”照相機頗有名氣。
這臺望遠鏡擁有三臺高靈敏度的紅外照相機。

sentences.english: The lowest density that can be achieved in a given photographic or photomechanical system.
sentences.chinese: 在指定的攝影或照相系統中能達到的最低濃度值。

sentences.english: This camera with a magic eye costs much more than that automat.
sentences.chinese: 這架裝有電眼的照相機比那臺自動的要貴得多。

definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
selfie stick/also written 自拍杆[zi4 pai1 gan1]
photogenic/to appear on film or in the media
